features: ✨Premium material: Our lumbar support pillow is filled with a new temperature-sensitive sponge, the lumbar support can adjust the contour of your back according to the temperature. The outer layer of the lumbar back pillow is made of high-quality, breathable fabric. The fabric of the back support pillow is comfortable and soft, not easy to fade. The parts of the lumbar back pillow have been certified and are safe and harmless to human health.

✨High-quality design: The back support pillow for the chair is ergonomically designed, and the pillow for back pain has a partitioned design, memory foam back cushion can support your back curve and promotes a healthy posture. The lumbar support pillow for chair uses elastic straps to keep the lumbar support pillow for the couch firmly fixed on the seat.

✨Protect your health: With our back support for car, you can better protect your spine, desk chair back support helps relieve lower and middle back tension caused by prolonged sitting or driving. If you often experience back pain from sitting for a long time, you should definitely try a back cushion for office chair.

✨Easier cleaning: The car lumbar support uses a zippered open pillowcase. To wash, just remove the pillowcase and let it dry. The fabric of the gaming chair pillow is strong and durable enough to fit any brand of the front load washing machine. The lumbar pillow's easy-to-clean pillowcase means you no longer have to worry about soiling your back support pillow, avoiding contamination from sweat and dust.

✨For more scenarios: Dual adjustable straps ensure the backrest supports the chair pillow to stay where you want it to be. ergonomic chair back support can follow you to a chair in any environment, chair back support is suitable for office chairs, computer chairs, sofas, car seats, SUVs, trucks, wheelchairs, recliners, or other larger home office accessories.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Watch the video for more details of seeknow lumbar support pillow

Zoned design supports the back The Back Support Pillow for Office Chair adopts an ergonomic partition design, and the ABC three points support different areas of the back respectively, providing you with a new comfortable experience. Removable cover and Premium memory foam filling The Lumbar Support Pillow for Car is made of breathable and easy-to-clean fabric.The built-in interlining design keeps the memory foam core from dust pollution and prolongs the service life. The memory foam inner core is soft and has no lack of support,which can fit the body perfectly with body temperature changes.The memory foam long lumbar pillow is durable and does not contain harmful substances, please use it with confidence. Dual strap design We have upgraded the fixing strap of Lumbar Support Pillow for Car according to market feedback. Compared with other styles, the double straps can firmly fix the back support pillow on the seat. The adjustable length on both sides makes the lumbar support pillow suitable for almost all Large chairs. Effectively relieve back pain The "C" shape of the chair back pillow for office chair can perfectly fit the spine and relieve back fatigue caused by long-term office sitting, reading, long-term driving and pregnancy. Machine washable fabric Seeknow car lumbar support is made of strong and non-fading fabric, and the cover opening is designed with a zipper for easy disassembly and cleaning.When it needs to be cleaned, just remove the pillowcase and put it in the washing machine, and then dry it after washing. It should be noted that the memory foam inner core is not machine washable,if it must be cleaned, it can be wiped with a wet wipe.

Does the Back Support Pillow feel hot to use? No, the back pillow is made of breathable fabric, which can maintain good breathability during use. Can the straps be used in the car？ Yes, the strap of this back pillow for car can wrap around the car seat to help you fix it on the car seat. What is the size of the back support for office chair？ 17.3'X14.9X4.7inches，this size is suitable for most people. How long does it take for vacuum-packed lumbar back support to expand to the required size? The memory foam core usually returns to the used size within 5 minutes. Will this help besides just lumbar support? Help with mid, higher back? In addition to the lower back, it can also be supported to where the thoracic spine is located.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office chair and big truck drivers seat.
reviews.reviewText: No more back issues. Have 1 in Semi Truck drivers seat and one on home office chair. Both excellent results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was absolutely what I wanted. My office chair at work was giving me back pain. Now I can work comfortably. Great! Will purchase another one for my husband.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stiff and deep but comfy in the right chair
reviews.reviewText: As mentioned, out of the package it's quite stiff. Not a terrible thing, as I wanted it for support and it will probably soften up as it breaks in. It's also pretty thick. I tried it in my office chair but felt like I was sitting on the edge of the chair and sliding forward all day. Ended up putting it in my car which is perfect. I'm kinda thin and it seems like every car seat nowadays is made all rounded and coushy for larger bodied people and I just sink into them and it hurts my back. I don't like sitting like that when I drive so this stiffer back helps me sit up straight. Only drawback to it being in the car is that the softness changes according to the temp. It's much more firm on cold days and much softer in the summer. Pretty good coushin though all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's comfortable and works well if your back hurts and your sofa is not very comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I hurt my back and was in a lot of pain. My sofa feels like there's a horizontal bar right where my lower back hurts the most. The cushion is kind of thick- it could probably be thinner and do the job just as well. It has a strap in back which won't work with the width of a sofa. I don't know how it would work with a recliner or an armchair, but mine works just fine without the strap. It's comfortable and compensates for the flaws of my sofa. I can't remember how much it cost, so that must mean it wasn't too incredibly expensive, but judge for yourself. It's comfortable, I like it, and I use it every day. I have no complaints at all about this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Satisfied with the product
reviews.reviewText: Quality material great support not to thick and adjustable for comfort. I work a 40 hr week via my home office and this is so helpful and the straps are adjustable to fit most chairs even my extra large gaming chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT back/lumber support for my CAR
reviews.reviewText: I initially bought this support for my chair at work, but the straps don't fit comfortably because of how the chair's back is designed; not at all the manufacturer's fault. So, I keep it in my car. It's extremely comfortable and offers great support and comfort for my back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secret sense I gift
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for a colleague who wanted for Christmas so I guess she read the reviews and it was good so I purchased it for her. She have not complained about her back ever since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way Too Thick AND it cost $8 To Return
reviews.reviewText: If you're reading this, you likely find yourself in a situation like mine: extended hours at a desk, grappling with back issues, and in search of a solution. I opted for this product thinking it was a cost-effective answer. While it looked promising quality-wise, once I attached it to the chair, I found it too thick. When seated, it felt as though the cushioning was overemphasized, almost double the thickness I needed. Simply put, it wasn't the right fit for me.I considered returning it since I had saved the packaging and only 10 minutes had passed since unboxing. However, the return fee is $7.99 for a $16 item. It doesn't seem worth it to spend half the product's cost on a return. What's truly disappointing is the idea of paying for a return on Amazon. We shop here believing that if a product isn't satisfactory, it can be returned with ease. While I seldom make returns, perhaps once a year, I appreciate the option. This purchase was an overall letdown.
Me gusto, pues por las horas de trabajo que elaboró disminuye mi cansancio, lo recomiendo ampliamente para las jornadas largas de trabajo, es cómodo y muy firme, llego en tiempo y forma. ¡Gracias!
Je l'utilise sur la chaise de mon bureau, très confortable, bon maintien
Forma ergonomica ottimale.Prezioso in macchina.Ottimo anche nella sedia della scrivania

reviews.reviewTitle: No se adapta a mi silla
reviews.reviewText: Es un cojin tan grande y voluminoso que hace que te sientes en el borde de la silla, con lo cual se hace incomodidimo. Es muy rígido y no se adapta a la espalda. Lo he devuelto
